constituent: dangerous, bound up, unlucky, cliff, fingerprint
koohiiStory1: If you live a dangerous life, eventually you're bound to get unlucky.
koohiiStory2: While rock climbing you are bound to the cliff by just your fingerprints, which is why it´s so dangerous.
kunYomi: あぶ.ない、あや.うい、あや.ぶむ
readingExamples: 危ない (あぶ.ない), 危うい (あや.うい), 危ぶむ (あや.ぶむ)
words: to fear, to have misgivings, to be doubtful, to mistrust
dangerous, critical, grave, uncertain, unreliable, limping, narrow, close, watch out!
